example.parse:
with an ARG0 only
(S (VP (PV+PVSUFF_SUBJ:3FS انتصرت) (NP-SBJ (DET+NOUN+NSUFF_FEM_SG+CASE_DEF_NOM المؤامرة))))

With ARG1
(S (VP (PV+PVSUFF_SUBJ:3MS انتصر) (NP-SBJ (NOUN_PROP+CASE_DEF_NOM لبنان)) (PP-CLR (PREP على) (NP (DET+NOUN+CASE_DEF_GEN العدو) (DET+ADJ+CASE_DEF_GEN الاسرائيلي)))))

With ARG2
(S (NP-SBJ (NP (NOUN_PROP عَرَفات)) (CONJ وَ-) (NP (NOUN+CASE_DEF_NOM -رِجالُ-) (POSS_PRON_3MS -هُ))) (ADJP-PRD (ADJ+NSUFF_MASC_PL_NOM مُقْتَنِعُونَ) (PP (PREP بِ-) (SBAR (SUB_CONJ -أَنَّ-) (S (NP-TPC-1 (PRON_3MP -هُم)) (VP (FUT+IV3MP+IV+IVSUFF_SUBJ:MP_MOOD:I سَيَنْتَصِرُونَ) (NP-SBJ-1 (-NONE- *T*)) (PP-CLR (PREP فِي) (NP (DEM_PRON_F ه`ذِهِ) (DET+NOUN+NSUFF_FEM_SG+CASE_DEF_GEN المَعْرَكَةِ))))))) (PUNC .))
